metadata.Description: Energy generated from the wind through the use of wind turbines to produce electricity.

wind energy.Description: Wind energy implements Energy Efficiency Policy by promoting the use of energy-saving designs and materials.
Wind energy funds Research and Development to improve wind turbine efficiency and develop new technologies.
Wind energy focuses on Renewable Energy Sources as a sustainable and clean energy solution.
Wind energy is used in Wind Farms to generate electricity from wind power.
Wind energy partners with Grid Operators to ensure efficient integration of wind power into the electricity grid.
Wind energy contributes to Climate Change Mitigation by reducing greenhouse gas emissions.
Wind energy monitors the performance of wind turbines to ensure optimal efficiency.
Wind energy targets Offshore Wind Development to harness the potential of wind resources in coastal areas.
